Description: Body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with traces of two pairs of bands in added white; exterior: sets ofconcentric circles, the outer one dotted, in handle zone, above two brown bands; brown band on lower walll.
Curator's comments: Lemos places this sherd in the Group of Chalices with Dotted Concentric Circles because of the decoration around the handle zone and in between the handles (Lemos 1991, 70).
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 70, p. 237, no. 163, pl. 15)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0145) (phase 2)
